Name: total_effort_must_not_exceed_velocity
Description: The sum of story points in a Sprint Backlog must not exceed the team's average Velocity.

Name: worker_availability_must_be_respected
Description: The sum of effort for tasks assigned to a Worker must not exceed their specified availability.

Name: project_must_stay_within_budget
Description: The total cost incurred cannot exceed the allocated project budget.

Name: sprint_must_have_a_goal
Description: Every Sprint must be associated with at least one Sprint Goal.

Name: user_story_requires_acceptance_criteria
Description: A User Story cannot be selected for a sprint unless its acceptance_criteria field is filled.

Name: task_must_belong_to_a_user_story
Description: Every Task must be a decomposition of a User Story that is part of the Sprint Backlog.

Name: team_size_must_be_within_scrum_limits
Description: The size of any given Team must be within the typical agile range (e.g., 3 to 9).

Name: high_severity_blocker_cannot_be_ignored
Description: Any Blocker with the highest severity level must be addressed in the current sprint.

Name: feature_must_have_documentation
Description: A Feature cannot be considered 'done' until corresponding Feature Documentation exists.

Name: a_team_must_have_a_scrum_master
Description: Every active Team must have an assigned Scrum Master.

Name: product_owner_must_manage_backlog
Description: A Product Backlog must be managed by one and only one Product Owner.
